name: Dead or Alive 5 Last Round: Core Fighters - Samurai Warriors Mashup Set
summary: This set contains all the Samurai Warriors Mashup costumes. This set contains costumes for the following characters: All characters except Akira, Jacky, Pai, Sarah, and Naotora Ii. *The Azuchi stage shown in the screenshots cannot be used in this version of the game. *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
